page.title: 20NW Derby Area - Credits
page.content: The Derby (North West Quarter) Domesday Survey 1985 was compiled by the pupils and staff of the following schools: {Ashgate Junior School,}Ashbourne Road, Derby. (Text pages 7, 9, 11) {College Church of England Primary {School,}Uttoxeter New Road, Derby. (Text pages 2, 3, 12) {Friargate House School,}65 Friargate, Derby. (Text Pages 5, 16) {Markeaton Primary School,}Newton's Walk, Bromley Street, Derby. (Text pages 1, 17, 18, 19) {Parkfields School,}Prince Charles Avenue, Mackworth Estate, Derby. (Text pages 6, 8, 13) {Walter Evans Church of England Primary {School,}Darley Abbey Drive, Darley Abbey, Derby. (Text pages 4, 10, 14, 15)
